message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $9,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product. I could meet you halfway â€“ how about $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $8,800 for the product?
